resources.string: On first launch, or on first launch after changing language setting,\nrefreshing may take a while (sometimes tens of seconds).
Notification icon always shown to launch Blue Line Console everywhere
This option just shows you the guidance for help command. It is better to disable this option once you remembered "help" command.
Always show the notification icon to start Blue Line Console everywhere.
Note: You can find apps by a part of package name even this check is off.
Add custom URL or search engine
Search engine (query is added at the end when enabled)

You can input one of below list to search apps or commands. 
 
- Part of application name (e.g. Blue Line Console) 
- Part of package name (e.g. net.nhiroki.bluelineconsole) 
- URL (e.g. https://example.com/) 
- Calculation formula (e.g. 2+3*5) 
- One of commands below (e.g. help) 
 
Available commands: 
 
- help 
- config 
- date 
- bing <query> 
- duckduckgo <query> 
- google <query> 
- wikipedia <query> 
- yahoo <query> 
 
Name for search engine name can be abbreviated. 
For example, "d somequery" is equivalent to "duckduckgo somequery". 
 
Hint: Set up Blue Line Console as Default Assist App from Settings > Apps & notofications > Default Apps > Assist app or similar menu, to make Blue Line Console open on long-pressing home button. 
Hint: Blue Line Console can be launched from notification menu by always showing notification. Find the option from config command.
Invalid URL: must start with https:// or http:// and at least one more slash ("/").
Invalid name: command can contain only digits and lower alphabets, and must not be empty
